DeathClock:ScytheStrike.NAME: Scythe Strike
DeathClock:ScytheStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and inflicts !M! stack(s) of deathclock:Summon_Death

DeathClock:DodgeDeath.NAME: Dodge Death
DeathClock:DodgeDeath.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and reduces !M! stack(s) of deathclock:Summon_Death

DeathClock:FutureProblem.NAME: Future Problem
DeathClock:FutureProblem.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block but you gain !M! stack(s) of deathclock:Summon_Death

DeathClock:Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
DeathClock:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Swap the amount of deathclock:Summon_Death with an enemy
DeathClock:Sacrifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap the amount of deathclock:Summon_Death with an enemy then resets yours

DeathClock:NotMyProblem.NAME: Not My Problem
DeathClock:NotMyProblem.DESCRIPTION: Inflicts stack(s) of deathclock:Summon_Death equal to the amount of stack(s) you have
DeathClock:NotMyProblem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gives your stack(s) of deathclock:Summon_Death to an enemy

DeathClock:NewLife.NAME: New Life
DeathClock:NewLife.DESCRIPTION: Resets your deathclock:Summon_Death, gain !B! block for every stack removed
